plot: A love triangle occurs. Francis and Mary are best friends, but when the beautiful Nick moves into their area, the balance and friendship is disturbed. What's Nick after? They both fall in love, and jealousy knocks on the door.
title: Dharkan
plot_es: A love triangle occurs. Francis and Mary are best friends, but when the beautiful Nick moves into their area, the balance and friendship is disturbed. What's Nick after? They both fall in love, and jealousy knocks on the door.
